title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Design a liquid-fueled rocket engine nozzle and submit calculations and drawings.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Analyze combustion chamber performance and present a report with simulation results.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Complete the nozzle design project including testing plan and expected performance metrics.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Timed quiz covering lift, drag, and airfoil theory.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Solve flow field problems using potential flow methods and CFD snapshots.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Perform thermal analysis for a re-entry body and submit a short report.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a primary structure element to meet given stiffness and strength requirements.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Compute transfer orbits and delta-v budgets for a sample mission.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Closed-book exam covering systems engineering concepts used in the course.
